titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that Congress and the President should increase basic pay for members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 5/25/2007--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Congress and the President should: (1) increase basic pay for members of all military components by 3.5%, effective January 1, 2008; and (2) provide a special survivor indemnity allowance for persons affected by required Survivor Benefit Plan (SBP) annuity offsets for dependency and indemnity compensation.
